arts.ttl: View: 'Immaculate' Aston Villa star accountable vs Maccabi Tel Aviv, Petrov rightly blown away
arts.sum: Stiliyan Petrov was delighted to see Morgan Rogers drag Aston Villa through against Maccabi Tel Aviv on Thursday. Villa secured a 2-0 win against Maccabi... arts.ttl: Morgan Rogers sends message to John McGinn after Aston Villa milestone in win vs Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: John McGinn made his 300th appearance for Aston Villa on Thursday as the Villans got back to winning ways in the Europa League. Villa beat... The post Morgan Rogers sends message to John McGinn after Aston Villa milestone in win vs Maccabi Tel Aviv appeared first on Villa News.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv police issue major update after night of protests
arts.sum: Missiles were allegedly thrown at West Midlands Police officers near Villa Park last night where Aston Villa played Maccabi Tel Aviv, a match to which away supporters were banned

arts.ttl: Police make 11 arrests at Aston Villa vs Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: West Midlands Police made 11 arrests as part of their operation at Aston Villa's Europa League fixture with Maccabi Tel Aviv.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 2-0 Maccabi Tel Aviv: Maatsen and Malen Magic Guides Villa Back to Winning Ways
arts.sum: Sancho, in a disjointed first half, played the ball forward for Malen in the box, only for his attempt to be deflected just wide. After some timely dribbling, Rogers worked his way into the visitors' box after keeping control up until Roi Mishpati stopped his chance.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa, Maccabi Tel Aviv and the protest that made football an afterthought
arts.sum: Aston Villa 2-0 Maccabi Tel Aviv: Unai Emery’ side cruised to a comfortable win over Israeli opposition but few will leave Villa Park talking about the result

arts.ttl: Protests take shine off Aston Villa’s comfortable win against Maccabi Tel Aviv
arts.sum: Goals in either half from Ian Maatsen and Donyell Malen sealed the points.

arts.ttl: Six arrests made before Aston Villa face Maccabi Tel Aviv amid demonstrations
arts.sum: The league phase match at Villa Park, which the hosts won 2-0, became a major political event.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery says Aston Villa player he rewarded vs Maccabi Tel Aviv is reaching his 'best level'
arts.sum: Aston Villa beat Maccabi Tel Aviv in a Europa League clash on November 6, with Unai Emery rewarding one player. It was a pretty torrid...

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 2-0 Maccabi Tel Aviv: Villans cruise to routine win as supporters arrested at pre-match protests
arts.sum: Hundreds attended demonstrations outside Villa Park before kick-off
